com.azure.storage.blob

Class ContainerClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.storage.blob.ContainerClientBuilder

  • public final class ContainerClientBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Fluent ContainerClientBuilder for instantiating a ContainerClient or ContainerAsyncClient using ContainerClientBuilder.buildClient() or ContainerClientBuilder.buildAsyncClient() respectively.

    The following information must be provided on this builder:

    • the endpoint through .endpoint(), including the container name, in the format of https://{accountName}.blob.core.windows.net/{containerName}.
    • the credential through .credential() or .connectionString() if the container is not publicly accessible.

    Once all the configurations are set on this builder, call .buildClient() to create a ContainerClient or .buildAsyncClient() to create a ContainerAsyncClient.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContainerClientBuilder()
      Creates a builder instance that is able to configure and construct ContainerClients and ContainerAsyncClients.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContainerClientBuilder addPolicy(HttpPipelinePolicy pipelinePolicy)
      Adds a pipeline policy to apply on each request sent
      ContainerClientBuilder anonymousCredential()
      Clears the credential used to authorize requests sent to the service
      ContainerAsyncClient buildAsyncClient()
      Creates a ContainerAsyncClient based on options set in the Builder.
      ContainerClient buildClient()
      Creates a ContainerClient based on options set in the Builder.
      ContainerClientBuilder configuration(Configuration configuration)
      Sets the configuration object used to retrieve environment configuration values used to buildClient the client with when they are not set in the appendBlobClientBuilder, defaults to Configuration.NONE
      ContainerClientBuilder connectionString(java.lang.String connectionString)
      Sets the connection string for the service, parses it for authentication information (account name, account key)
      ContainerClientBuilder containerName(java.lang.String containerName)
      Sets the name of the container this client is connecting to.
      ContainerClientBuilder credential(SASTokenCredential credential)
      Sets the credential used to authorize requests sent to the service
      ContainerClientBuilder credential(SharedKeyCredential credential)
      Sets the credential used to authorize requests sent to the service
      ContainerClientBuilder credential(TokenCredential credential)
      Sets the credential used to authorize requests sent to the service
      ContainerClientBuilder endpoint(java.lang.String endpoint)
      Sets the service endpoint, additionally parses it for information (SAS token, container name)
      ContainerClientBuilder httpClient(HttpClient httpClient)
      Sets the http client used to send service requests
      ContainerClientBuilder httpLogDetailLevel(HttpLogDetailLevel logLevel)
      Sets the logging level for service requests
      ContainerClientBuilder retryOptions(RequestRetryOptions retryOptions)
      Sets the request retry options for all the requests made through the client.
